long_description: Fold the brim in half and you have a hat you can stick in your cargo pants pocket. The superlight Traveler Hat from Sunday Afternoons vents, wicks, floats and protects you from harmful UV rays. UPF 50+ sun protection. Nylon hat has polyester-mesh side vents and a sweat-wicking headband. 3 in. folding clamshell front brim; 5.5 in. rear cape features a hidden zip pocket; chinstrap holds the wind at bay. Sunday Afternoons Traveler Hat comes with its own drawstring carry/storage bag. Closeout.
short_description: Fold the brim in half and you have a hat you can stick in your cargo pants pocket. The superlight Traveler Hat from Sunday Afternoons vents, wicks, floats and protects you from harmful UV rays.
